name: Cheezy Breezy
description:
Controls: Up and Down Arrow Keys.

Thanks for playing!

Cheezy Breezy wouldn't have been possible without the help of some amazing talent. Artists TacticalDevine and Frosty delivered some gnarly assets for this project! If you're looking for Artists who deliver and go the extra mile (or you just wanna see some cool art) check out their pages!

TacticalDevine:https://twitter.com/tacticaldivine_

Frosty: https://twitter.com/FrosstyArt
